actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow taxpayers to value any excess inventory of books and other published material at its net realizable value.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow taxpayers to value any excess inventory of books, maps, sheet music, periodicals, or similar printed material at the net realizable value of such inventory.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow taxpayers to value any excess inventory of books and other published material at its net realizable value.
